document_title: Wrist bursitis: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content:
To reduce the risk of wrist bursitis, you should note:
Increase exercise for the wrist joint area with simple movements such as rotating the wrist, gently bending and stretching. These exercises will help reduce pressure on the wrist joints and relax more.; Do not perform repetitive movements that require the use of the wrist for long periods of time. If it is related to specific work such as athletes, office workers, etc., you should take some time off to relax your wrist joints.; Maintain a scientific, healthy lifestyle by controlling your weight, supplementing nutrients, avoiding alcoholic beverages, stimulants and tobacco.; When persistent pain appears in your wrist, you should see a doctor soon for diagnosis and timely treatment.
